titles.title: When You Walk With The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When you walk with the Lord,
Each day is one that He has made.
When you walk with Jesus
Life's little pieces fall in place.
And you'll find things working out
You never thought that would,
For all things work together for good
To them who love God, every day
Is one that He has made.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And if you should ever feel
That the Lord's not real,
And He's a thousand miles away,
Just be assured it's for your own good;
Just trust the Lord and say... (repeat first part)
